sentences.sentence: I don't want to spend a lot of energy suppressing all my feelings so I appear uninvolved.
sentences.translation: 我不想花费大量的精力来压抑我的感情来表现的不相关。

sentences.sentence: Maybe his father was absent or uninvolved; maybe your dad faced many of the same fears and frustrations in his fathering.
sentences.translation: 也许父亲会缺席而且冷漠；也许父亲和爷爷也有着同样的一愉快。

sentences.sentence: The diurnal mean CH4 flux from rice-involved plot was significantly higher than that of rice uninvolved plot in the booting stage(P<0.01).
sentences.translation: 有植株参与稻田在孕穗期CH4昼夜平均排放通量显著高于无植株参与稻田（P<0.01）。
